channel.title: How to put a shield in a weapon slot?
channel.description: well, im not brand new coder and i know how to simply put a weapon or anything on another spot, something like put a rune dagger as a defender is the shield slot. i can do this by going in item files and adding the id to the respective spot, but.. there is no weapon one and i want to put mage book in weapon slot. is there anyway for me to do this? i mean, put no weapon items on weapon slots?

item.title: How to put a shield in a weapon slot?
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

ok, but as i said, there is NO weapon wield code.

Read full topic
item.source: How to put a shield in a weapon slot?

item.title: How to put a shield in a weapon slot?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

All you have to do is

Find mage book item id.

Get your item-wield code.

Paste, or type the mage book item id into the item wield code, Thus, making it as a weapon.

Read full topic
item.source: How to put a shield in a weapon slot?
